title: DocPath Announces Significant Improvements to Its Customer Communications Management Software for the Financial Sector
text:
In order to meet the rapidly changing business needs of the financial sector, the multinational document software provider recently released important enhancements to its DocPath ExcelDynamics solution.
Atlanta, GA (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
In response to the unique requirements of the financial sector and increasingly demanding customer expectations, DocPath, leader in innovative document software solutions, announced a new release of its DocPath ExcelDynamics solution, featuring more flexibility, increased performance levels and significant improvements in design features in order for clients to be able to create clearer and more complex financial reports.
Fast-Changing Expectations in the Financial Sector's Customers
As customer expectations continue to evolve, financial organizations of all sizes are under enormous pressure to retain profitable customers and connect with prospective clients via compelling documents. After all, for many financial institutions, bills, statements and reports are the most frequent methods of contact with customers, and customers worldwide are increasingly demanding when it comes to the documents they receive and the channels through which the documentation is delivered.
The latest update of DocPath ExcelDynamics addresses these fast-changing challenges by giving financial organizations improved performance, increased flexibility and more complete design capabilities for creating clear, complex and professional reports, that can be sent or made available online, as part of financial sectors Customer Communications Management processes.
DocPath ExcelDynamics Key New Capabilities and Features
The DocPath ExcelDynamics solution is part of DocPath´s Customer Communications Management-Enterprise suite. It is a powerful and easily integrable software geared towards financial institutions that need a potent yet user-friendly tool that enables them to create clear, detailed and compelling financial reports in spreadsheet format.
Key new features and capabilities in the latest document software release include:
Improved user interface – The solution now comes with a clearer, more concise and intuitive design interface to ensure that users of any profile are able to design complex financial reports.
Enhanced stability – DocPath SpreadSheet Designer, the solution´s design tool, has been enhanced with advanced automated error detection and recovery capabilities. The resulting process isolation and fault-tolerant tasks allow for a straightforward and agile user experience.
Wider range of functions – The range of supported operations has been expanded, with more available calculations and customized variables, enabling users to create more complex and complete formulas.
Performance and scalability upgrade – DocPath has boosted the solution´s overall performance and flexibility by optimizing each of its components.
Watch the DocPath ExcelDynamics presentation video and access more information on this innovative Customer Communications Management software here...
About DocPath
DocPath is a leading document software manufacturer that provides its world-wide customers the technology that allows them to implement sophisticated Customer Communications Management and Document Output Management processes. Created in 1992, DocPath solutions are found in companies all over the world. Its international clients include prestigious banks and first class corporations, which are aided by DocPath solutions by simplifying the complicated and critical task involving the design and distribution of business and customer documents. DocPath maintains a strong commitment to R&D&i, an area that receives a good amount of its revenue, and in which lies the key to the company´s success.
